Description.Text:
Property Location
You'll be centrally located in Berlin with a stay at Sheraton Berlin Grand Hotel Esplanade, steps from Bauhaus Archive and close to Brandenburg Gate. This 5-star hotel is close to Reichstag Building and Checkpoint Charlie Museum.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 394 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LED televisions. Cable programming provides entertainment, and wired and wireless Internet access is available for a surcharge. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature designer toiletries and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include laptop-compatible safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages and facials. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find an indoor pool, a sauna, and a fitness center. Additional amenities include wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant or in a coffee shop/café. Or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), a 24-hour business center, and a computer station. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant or in a coffee shop/café. Or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Additional amenities include wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature designer toiletries and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include laptop-compatible safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

You'll be centrally located in Berlin with a stay at Sheraton Berlin Grand Hotel Esplanade, steps from Bauhaus Archive and close to Brandenburg Gate. This 5-star hotel is close to Reichstag Building and Checkpoint Charlie Museum.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Bauhaus Archive - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Gemaeldegalerie - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
New National Gallery - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Victory Column - 1 km / 0.6 mi
KaDeWe - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Berlin State Library - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Berliner Philharmonie - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Europa Center - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Spielbank Berlin - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Musical Instrument Museum - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Berlinale Palast - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Kaiser Wilhelm Memorial Church - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Bellevue Palace - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Sony Center - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Berlin Zoo - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi

The nearest airports are:
Berlin (TXL-Tegel) - 6.5 km / 4 mi
Berlin (SXF-Schoenefeld) - 16.8 km / 10.5 mi

The preferred airport for Sheraton Berlin Grand Hotel Esplanade is Berlin (TXL-Tegel).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The closest major airports to Grand Hotel Esplanade are:
Berlin (TXL-Tegel) - 6.5 km / 4 mi
Berlin (SXF-Schonefeld) - 16.8 km / 10.5 mi

The preferred airport for Grand Hotel Esplanade is Berlin (TXL-Tegel).

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometre.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
